about_the_game:
A fantasy based Action-RPG game with main hero Kuma the bear. Aside from being a bear Kuma is also The Environmental Protector with the mission to protect the forest from pollution by eliminating all trespassers. The game contains fast paced combat along with jumping puzzles and clever mechanics.

Take control of Kuma now and save the environment!

The world of Kuma consists of one continent split in half by a big river. The player can freely explore the world and travel between villages of each side. To travel across the river the player has access to magical portals.

Features

  • Roam freely in the world with third person camera and controller
  • Protect the forest with melee combat with axe (J for axe then, Left mouse button for hit)
  • Interact with the terrain either by Digging or Adding (K and L buttons then Left mouse button)
  • Gather items, materials or keys in the world (E or F buttons)
  • Occasionally be bad and burn the forest down (M button brings up the torch)
